translation: Also, the man who hears this, full of faith and free from malice, shall attain to the happy worlds of those of righteous deeds, and be liberated.
commentary: 18.71 faithful full of faith? Anasuyah free from malice? f and? may hear may hear? Even also? who who? Man: man? He he? Even also? freed liberated? Shubhan happy? Lokan worlds? shall attain shall attain? Punyakarmanam of those of righteous deeds.Commentary Liberated from sin.Punyakarmanam Of those who have done Agnihotra and such other sacrifices.He too Much more so who understands the teachings of the Gita? lives in its spirit and who practices the most valuable spiritual instructions contained in it.
